  • Constructor Details

    • GameModel

      public GameModel(GameField humanPlayerField, GameField computerPlayerField, Ruleset rules, AIAgent agent, String playerName, String computerName)
      Construct a new game model
      Parameters:
      humanPlayerField - The game field of the human player
      computerPlayerField - The game field of the enemy AI player
      rules - The rule set for the game
      agent - The AIAgent determining the difficulty of the enemy player
      playerName - The name of the human player
      computerName - The name of the enemy AI player
